messages:
Welcome to the Beat The Competition GAME!
A project made by FMH Projects!
Enjoy it!

Your mission is to beat YOUR COMPETITION
 by scoring more goals THAN YOUR ENEMY!!!!!
This is important, only wins count!!

Your goal is to get the World Champion Trophy
Which only belongs to the BEST Disc!

It will be a long walk, but YOU can do it!
Make sure you always play for the win,
then you will be okay!

As levels pass, the enemies will be smarter
and the levels will be more challenging.
So enjoy the journey!

Good LUCK, WARRIOR! :D
ARE YOU READY?
